---
title: "Integrated Development Editor (IDE)"
---

## Pengertian *IDE*

IDE *(Integrated Development Editor)*

## Jenis *IDE*

*IDE* berbasis GUI *(Graphical User Interface)* dengan spesifik bahasa pemrograman:
  
* rstudio
* spyder

*IDE* berbasis GUI *(Graphical User Interface)* dengan tujuan umum:
  
* vscode
* vscodium
* geany
